name: R5-EpisodeOfCare-R4-EpisodeOfCare
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 EpisodeOfCare into FHIR R4

element.display: An association of a Patient with an Organization and  Healthcare Provider(s) for a period of time that the Organization assumes some level of responsibility

target.display: An association of a Patient with an Organization and  Healthcare Provider(s) for a period of time that the Organization assumes some level of responsibility
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare`

element.display: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this EpisodeOfCare

target.display: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this EpisodeOfCare
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.account` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.account`

element.display: Care manager/care coordinator for the patient

target.display: Care manager/care coordinator for the patient
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.careManager` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.careManager`

element.display: Other practitioners facilitating this episode of care
Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.contained`

element.display: The list of medical conditions that were addressed during the episode of care

target.display: The list of diagnosis relevant to this episode of care
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis`

element.display: The medical condition that was addressed during the episode of care

target.display: Conditions/problems/diagnoses this episode of care is for
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.condition` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.condition` - condition made the element mandatory; condition increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1; condition changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1); condition removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-code; condition has change due to type change: R5 condition CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 condition

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Role that this diagnosis has within the episode of care (e.g. admission, billing, discharge …)
Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.id`

element.display: Business Identifier(s) relevant for this EpisodeOfCare

target.display: Business Identifier(s) relevant for this EpisodeOfCare
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Organization that assumes responsibility for care coordination

target.display: Organization that assumes care
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.managingOrganization` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.managingOrganization`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: The patient who is the focus of this episode of care

target.display: The patient who is the focus of this episode of care
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.patient` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.patient`

element.display: Interval during responsibility is assumed

target.display: Interval during responsibility is assumed
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.period` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.period`

element.display: The list of medical reasons that are expected to be addressed during the episode of care
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
What the reason value should be used for/as
Medical reason to be addressed
Originating Referral Request(s)

target.display: Originating Referral Request(s)
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.referralRequest` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.referralRequest`

element.display: planned | waitlist | active | onhold | finished | cancelled | entered-in-error

target.display: planned | waitlist | active | onhold | finished | cancelled | entered-in-error
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/episode-of-care-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/episode-of-care-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Past list of status codes (the current status may be included to cover the start date of the status)

target.display: Past list of status codes (the current status may be included to cover the start date of the status)
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.statusHistory` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.statusHistory`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.statusHistory.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.statusHistory.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.statusHistory.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.statusHistory.id`

target.display: Duration the EpisodeOfCare was in the specified status
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.statusHistory.period` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.statusHistory.period`

element.display: planned | waitlist | active | onhold | finished | cancelled | entered-in-error

target.display: planned | waitlist | active | onhold | finished | cancelled | entered-in-error
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.statusHistory.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.statusHistory.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/episode-of-care-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/episode-of-care-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.text`

element.display: Type/class  - e.g. specialist referral, disease management

target.display: Type/class  - e.g. specialist referral, disease management
target.comment: R5 `EpisodeOfCare.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.type`
